subject: PSYCH
title: Directed Studies - Natural Science Research
description: The student conducts an empirical research project in a natural science area of psychology under the supervision of a faculty member. Course requirements include writing a report of the research carried out. The course application form must include a detailed course plan including the method of evaluation. [Note:  Normally students will take no more than three of PSYCH 480-486. Offered: F,W,S]
